title: Joint Event Starts!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Come on, hurry up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>W-, wait! Hey, is my ribbon crooked in any way? Or is it okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s perfect as always. No problem. Rina-chan’s board「Peace」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Today is the day where everyone will see how much cuter Kasumin has become!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>The day where everyone can immerse themselves in my expressions!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The day where we can connect deeper and deeper with people who come to see us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Let’s enjoy this joint event that we’ve all prepared for to the fullest!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeaaah!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeaaah!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah.... I made special drinks. Do you guys want it.... before the event?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Noooo!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
